QuestData.Title: Scouting the Palace
QuestData.Description: We cannot hide here forever, $n. We have to deal with Azshara.$b$bWe will need to assault her palace but we do not know what defenses she has in place. I dispatched a scouting team while you were gone and they have not reported back.$b$bI cannot afford to lose any more people. Speak with Spiritwalker Ussoh. His abilities will let us see where the scouts are.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Spiritwalker Ussoh to observe the scouting party.
